all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
He that asketh in the Spirit asketh according to the will of God; wherefore it is done even as he asketh.
Doctrine and Covenants 46:30
Quote of the Day
"Scripture records that “the song of the righteous is a prayer unto [God]” in which His soul delights. So let’s sing! And praise Him!"
Patrick Kearon | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
